questions: Name the largest artery in the human body.
answers: The largest artery in the human body is Aorta.

questions: Why is the walls of ventricles thicker than the walls of atria ?
answers: Ventricles have to pump blood into various organs. So, they have thicker walls than the walls of atria. 1

questions: Name the tissues which (i) transport soluble products of photosynthesis in plants, (ii) transport water and minerals in a plant.
What process in plants is known as transpiration ?
answers: It is the loss of water in the vapour form from the exposed parts of a plant.
Lymph carries digested and absorbed fat from intestine.
